column3: “Blue Nina “The storm of happiness”. Elevated by an uplifting angel that brings you back to your innate bliss. For ever a fan of blue dream crosses, as I am never disappointed with its anti-depression like effects. To be synchronized with life.”
“This is a happy, feel good high. I would recommend this for someone with PTSD. My husband and I like this strain a lot.”
“Goofy and sexy! Happy Happy Joy Joy.”
“Very tasty and relaxing strain. This one sort of sneaks up on you though, so newbie consumers should proceed with caution.”
“I have nothing negative to say about this strain except I prefer Lemon Skunk...barely.  Amazing for erasing a bad mood and put your focus glasses on!  I'm a social butterfly when on Blue Nina.”
“was on Black Friday special for $50 Oz, super happy with quality and overall effect atm. getting ripped and making Thanksgiving!!”
“One  of my favorites. Blue dream is a go to so tried this one... great sativa for a fun daytime. Good for those prone to anxiety- pure happiness here”
